document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad should free all political prisoners and allow peaceful rallies to show he is serious about reform or risk provoking a stronger challenge to his 11-year rule, activists say.
document.title: syria's assad "faces strong challenge without reform"
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad should free all political prisoners and allow peaceful rallies to show he is serious about reform or risk provoking a stronger challenge to his 11-year rule, activists say.
